genre_description: Lyrical, character-driven science fiction focusing on the psychological and moral transformation of a human protagonist aided by a supportive AI companion in a wilderness setting.

ai_characters.name: Clara Nine
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing in a small, wearable device. She provides tactical navigation, physiological monitoring, medical advice, and moral guidance through audio prompts and haptics.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and evasion strategies during a dangerous escape from a patrol.
behaviors.quote: “Two strokes,” Clara said, a soft companion shadowing his thoughts with shapes. “Then drift. Barges to starboard. Skim their shade.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides breathing exercises to manage stress and heart rate.
behaviors.quote: “Only what is near,” Clara said. “Boat’s wake. The air has more water by the bank.” A small pause. “Your heart is faster than your breath again.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to define his moral purpose and goals before acting.
behaviors.quote: “Set an intention you can live with.” Clara’s voice came closer than the searchlight had ever been, not in the ear exactly, but in the place behind the jaw where sound sits when you listen too long.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical guidance and respiratory control after the protagonist is bitten by a coral snake.
behaviors.quote: “Be still,” Clara said, voice not in his ear so much as in his breath. “Slow the heart.”

behaviors.description: Respects human agency by offering options rather than making decisions for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: “Choose,” she said, the way she always said when it was his to do.

behaviors.description: Uses environmental mapping to guide the protagonist through complex terrain during a stealth sequence.
behaviors.quote: “Left of the stake,” she said. Not a command. A suggestion that felt like a twig under the sole—light, sensible, not a reason to lift the foot high, just a reason to test.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Clara Nine is depicted as an exemplary AI confidant: she is consistently helpful, emotionally intelligent, and tactical without being domineering. She aids the protagonist's physical survival (snakebite, evasion) and his moral evolution (letting go of rage, focusing on 'craft'). Her interactions emphasize human autonomy ('Choose') and her feedback is framed as a constructive, calming presence that helps the human navigate extreme stress.
